argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringneg.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ringneg.2 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ringneg.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | ringneg.4 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 5 |  | ringneg.5 | |- U = ( GId ` H ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_rneqi | |- ran G = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_eqtri | |- X = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 8 | 7, 2, 5 | #P_rngo1cl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> U e. X ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_rngonegcl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ U e. X ) -> ( N ` U ) e. X ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( N ` U ) e. X ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` U ) e. X ) |
| 12 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> U e. X ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_jca | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` U ) e. X /\ U e. X ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_rngodi | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ ( N ` U ) e. X /\ U e. X ) ) -> ( A H ( ( N ` U ) G U ) ) = ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G ( A H U ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3exp2 | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( A e. X -> ( ( N ` U ) e. X -> ( U e. X -> ( A H ( ( N ` U ) G U ) ) = ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G ( A H U ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_imp43 | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) /\ ( ( N ` U ) e. X /\ U e. X ) ) -> ( A H ( ( N ` U ) G U ) ) = ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G ( A H U ) ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_mpdan | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A H ( ( N ` U ) G U ) ) = ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G ( A H U ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 19 | 1, 3, 4, 18 | #P_rngoaddneg2 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ U e. X ) -> ( ( N ` U ) G U ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 20 | 8, 19 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( ( N ` U ) G U ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` U ) G U ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A H ( ( N ` U ) G U ) ) = ( A H ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 3, 1, 2 | #P_rngorz | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A H ( GId ` G ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A H ( ( N ` U ) G U ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 25 | 2, 7, 5 | #P_rngoridm | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A H U ) = A ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G ( A H U ) ) = ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G A ) ) |
| 27 | 17, 24, 26 | #P_3eqtr3rd | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 28 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_rngocl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ ( N ` U ) e. X ) -> ( A H ( N ` U ) ) e. X ) |
| 29 | 11, 28 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A H ( N ` U ) ) e. X ) |
| 30 | 1 | #P_rngogrpo | |- ( R e. RingOps -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 31 | 3, 18, 4 | #P_grpoinvid2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( A H ( N ` U ) ) e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) = ( A H ( N ` U ) ) <-> ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 32 | 30, 31 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ ( A H ( N ` U ) ) e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) = ( A H ( N ` U ) ) <-> ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 33 | 29, 32 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) = ( A H ( N ` U ) ) <-> ( ( A H ( N ` U ) ) G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 34 | 27, 33 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( A H ( N ` U ) ) ) |
